model

Class Song

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Song

  • public class Song
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Song class that controls the way a song is played.
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Jordan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Song

        public Song()
        This is the main constructor which is empty. It instantiates the arraylist for the length in which the note is played and the value of the notes themselves. It also instantiates the Synthesizer, the Instrument and the MidiChannel that will be used to play the song.

    • Method Detail

      • getNotes

        public void getNotes(java.lang.String file)
              throws java.io.IOException
        This method retrieves the notes from the file given and then applies them to the notes ArrayList. It also checks for the length in which the note will be played and applies it to the noteLength ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        file - this is a string of the filepath being passed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - this exception is thrown if there is an issue reading the file

      • playSong

        public void playSong()
        This method plays the song by reading the notes from the the arrayList. Each note length is determined first in case there is a rest that needs to be played. Then the appropriate note is played for the specified length.
